conbody.p: RemoteTM a is a secure multiuser application designed for sharing the super fast Internal Translation Memory engine used in Swordfish IV in LAN environments or over the Internet.
RemoteTM runs on top of a Java Servlet container like Apache Tomcat or Jetty.
RemoteTM is a platform independent application. It can be used in all operating systems where the combination of Java and Apache Tomcat or Jetty works.
